Its funny how some things tend to carry on wherever you go.. like getting together on that certain night for dinner or that nightly poker game or huddleing around the tv with 10 plus people watching zoomed in vaginas and penises as we critisize the porn thats in the dvd player at the time...which by the way, for those of you who watch porn, threes company this is for you I recomend Bella loves Jenna. We had like 10 people at our place last night watching porna nd it reminded me when we would do that in coronado, most likely at Taylors house with a drink in our hands and trying to figure out what that gross thing was that was comming out of this chicks cooter...I love those memories.

Im in possibly one of the weirdest/worst moods I can ever experience. I dont even know why, Its all mixed up feelings. I mean, being hogged tied and crying cuz of the pain deffinitly triggered this but now, its been 2 hours since then and I have this empty feeling. I was sitting here like 5 min ago dowloading music and tears started running down my cheek and im thinking what a pathetic loser I am, I have no reason to be crying. I absolutly hate being in these moods, mostly because its so opposite of who I am. I dont think ive found my place here.. i mean i have friends and they are really cool but I havnt found anyone or anywhere where I can feel 100% comfortable and I miss that feeling. I felt like I had it and one day woke up and it was gone. I dont even know what the fuck im talking about anymore. If she could just get the word out God knows she's trying They're watching her with eyes closed She's always stuck with the old route Does anyone knock when they barge in to beat her down? Will you come back? It's all she wants to know She knows she's part of the problem too Could she let it go? It'd take a miracle So that's what I'm praying for No one can know just how she feels She won't use the phone, she's too tired to pick it up She's going back to the old way She sits in the classroom to learn with the others

Can't seem to figure out what happens after this. Why can't I? Im so at a loss for words. Today was a horrible day. I really hope he doesnt read this, or he'd feel even worse. Maybe I just shouldnt write in here huh? that would be safer. What the hell else am I supposed to do? oh well, its nothing he doesnt already know. I hate crying. I tried stopping, I went on a walk in the dark and everything. And Im scared of the dark. It didnt do much, I still cried. Only this time in the dark. Hes trying to protect me, I know he is. Thats why I love him. I just hate not having him. Theres nothing I would want more then to simply see him. I wish things were so much easier.

Come downstairs and say hello.

Dorothy moves to click her ruby shoes
Right in tune with dark side of the moon
Someone, someone could tell me
Where I belong
Be calm, be brave, it'll be okay
No more messing around and living underground
And new year's resolutions
By this time next year I won't be here
I turn on MTV, the volume's down
Lips move, they say
It'll be okay

To tell you the truth, I've said it before
Tomorrow I start in a new direction
One last time these words from me
I'm never saying them again
and I shut the light
and listen as my watch unwinds
To tell you the truth, I've said it before
Tomorrow I start in a new direction
I know I've been half-asleep
I'm never doing that again
I look straight at what's coming ahead
and soon its going to change in a new direction
Every night as I'm falling asleep
These words repeating in my head

Voices calling from a yellow road
To come downstairs and say hello
Don't be shy, just say hello
To tell you the truth, I've said it before

I know I've been half-asleep
I'm never doing that again
I look straight at what's coming ahead
and soon its going to change in a new direction
Every night as I'm falling asleep
These words repeated in my head

wow. Its been a while. I went though this stage where writting was a waste of time and I was just too lazy but its already making me feel a lil bit better. Better, only Im not sure what Im feeling beter about. Hmm, thats kind of funny now that I think about it. So forgive me if you missed me, but Im back. And Im moving. Into the states! Its been how long.. let me count.. 1, 2, 3...11 years! Im so ready for a change, so ready. I hate saying goodbye. A year ago I was thinking how much i was going to hate my senior year because of the lack of friends I had in my grade and I can honestly say this has been the best year of my high school experience. So many good things have happened to me and I wont let the bad cancel them out. I made new friends. New amazing friends. People I never thought Id be speaking to and I couldnt see my Senior year as memorable without them. We did crazy shit. Crazy shit that got us in trouble but was all worth it. I took risks. I took the biggest risk of my life and I got the best thing out of it and I wouldnt change that for the world. It may seem a little late to be looking back at my senior year but its now that its starting to hit me. Now that I have to let go of people I never thought I'd meet and Im gonna miss those faces. If I could give anyone anything before they leave id give them the satisfaction of knowing that they made a difference in someones life. So thank you, I just hope you all had as much fun as I did and I wish everyone the best of luck in the years to come. We are growing up bitches, dont it feel good!

Im miles away from that dark cold room where my body actually is and I hate it. 
I sit here in amazement at how selfish one person can be. 
A coldness runs through me, as if my veins were filled with ice water. 
And I hate it.
In the dim light I could see my regrets flash before me and yet I just lay there as they pass, not trying to stop them.
And then that selfish person is no longer selfish but now tied up in the moment and it turns to lust and immaturity and it all goes back to those little things I want to be blinded from. 
I rather not know what will make me cry.
Please, be that strong person I cannot be. Protect me from what it is you know I dont want to hear.
It feels as though you are the only one who understands and at the same time cares the least.
Its that feeling you get when you see something bad happening and as its happening in slow motion you let it happen without preventing it.
Its selfishness that got the worst of me.

light is breaking through the window We count the miles Do you hum to static in your own life? Or the radio? Cut a little bit of me out tonight Take a little bit of me inside to make you right. Yeah so its been a while. Forgive me. Usually i would post up pictures which would explain how my summer has been so far, but that would take too long cuz there would be many pictures. I can say that so far this has been THE best summer. I felt like Ive done so much already. I like hanging out with everyone, even if it is just sitting at jesses watching the boys moon people on his web cam. If things go as planned Ill be going to Florida in around a month or so. I cant wait to see him. I miss him so much. Things such seem to be getting better and I cant wait. Then theres me moving in with Christi as we are educated at camp college and that excites me too. Im so sick of being brought down by my family and Im sick of letting myself be brought down. So this is me and this is who I am. Im no longer going to wish I was someone else, someone they want me to be, simply because thats too much work and I cant please them. Im sticking to those people who love me for who I am and people like that shouldnt be taken for granted. So thank you, to everyone who doesnt judge me. Not only is this a new step in my life, its sort of a new life, and Im loveing it. The first night how we slept with the light off All the stars shine above And all our clothes are on the floor All the things that I feel that I cant describe Why cant it be like the first week?

She looks over to take one last look at his face. "I dont blame you" she said, "I just wish I wouldnt have met you" She realizes she doesnt know where she has been and wonders if he has a clue.
But atleast she knew his name.
She rolls down the window to let the air hit her flushed face and takes in the scent of warm vanilla lace. Reminds her of the night before how he'd gently kiss her every inch. And it was so good and so wrong.
But atleast she knew his name.
And that guilt she dreaded has now made its way to that knot in her throat.And left and right mean nothing, but to go back would mean the world. Everyone has their faults she thought. No one will have to know. But now as she looks into the mirror she sees someone she didnt set out to be.
But atleast she knew his name.

I lie awake at night and never sleep to watch you breathing Wow so... almost done with school huh? Why yes sir that I be. And im THIS much excited. I just cant wait to walk and get my diploma and cheer and scream for all my friends and then go to a party afterwards and then go to cancun where ill be wishing i were somewhere else and then come back to...well, nothing. Im so scared, about everything. About life and...everything. What if I prove my mom right and want to come home. No.. never, I will say this... no matter how horrible of a time im having in school and how much i hate it i will not go home. Theres no way I can prove her right. Maybe you think I have too much pride...i guess you just have to know the wench to understand. Im gonna promise myself I will not stress out this summer, I wont let my mother bug me, Im going to enjoy this summer as much as possible and hang out with my friends and go to Florida and have tons of fun. I wish everyone tons of luck in everything they do.

"An eye for an eye only makes the whole world blind"-Gandhi I worry about those kind of people. The ones who wait for their prince to walk in and sweep them off their feet. I worry about them. I wonder if they are ever content with anything less than perfect. I worry. Its those kind of people that make really good boss'. You know... the kind that wont take no for an answer. They are those kind of people that turn into the dragons at the end of the movie. I am those kind of people. We are all those people and yet I still worry. I didnt know i'd need an invitation but please let me in... look, im going stag. I was those kind of people and now i no longer worry. I worry about those kind of people who worry about those kind of people.

Happy Cinco de Mayo! Yeah so many people dont know what that is. So here is your education for the day. Take notes now, I dont want to repeat this next year. The 5th of May is not Mexican Independence Day, but it should be! And Cinco de Mayo is not an American holiday, but it should be. Mexico declared its independence from mother Spain on midnight, the 15th of September, 1810. So what is cinco de Mayo? it was when 4,000 Mexican soldiers smashed the French and traitor Mexican army of 8,000 at Puebla, Mexico, 100 miles east of Mexico City on the morning of May 5, 1862. So do we have all that? Good...Im glad.

Its 2:40 a.m. and I feel like making a list. Ive been awake for 22 hrs and most people would sleep...no, idiot me feels like making a list. Things that I dislike 1.Ignorant people. I say, we ignore the ignorant. 2.My grandfather, long story. 3.The dark...another long story and we have #2 to thank for that. 4.The thought of ending up alone. Not like never getting married... but alone when im like 80 in a house and dieing by my lonesome. 5.Going to L.A. 6.People from Venezuela who live in my house. 7.Him being so far. I miss him. 8.Negative attitudes 9.My dads 40 phone calls a day. 10.Onions. Onions can suck a fatty 11.Goind downstairs hungry, finding your favorite cereal is in the pantry, serving urself a bowl, only to find theres no milk. 12.Pink. not so much anymore, im starting to wear it now. 13.People with trees up their ass',not the stick, but the tree. 14.Not being able to drive legally in both countries 15.Living in Mexico 16.Grape flavored candy. It all tastes like medicine to me. I think thats It for now..im sure with time the list will grow. Lets hope not. I would like to have a longer list of "Things that make me happy" rather than "Things I dislike" Im caught between reality and my thoughts, my dreams and what id like to me.

Hi, Hello... ok so this is me, completely sick and tired of my family. I have a feeling this may be long and Id advise you not to read it for it wont entertain you at all.
Basically, theres no way to shorten this but to say im tired. Im physically and mentally tired. Im not one to vent, if anything I tend to bottle things up. Lately though Ive been feeling like crap at school. I notice myself taking it out on others and I want to stop, I figured the only way to do that was to vent. When Im at home, I feel like its just me. At a family gathering, again...just me. I guess you can say I feel alone. But im not really, I mean I have awesome friends and what not but most of them.. actually, almost all of them dont know whats going on. The ones that do I dont want to bother. Even if they did want to hear me out, which I know they would, I wouldnt know where to start, because I dont exactly know what hurts. Its just this pain thats constantly reminding me that no matter what I do I was meant to be apart of this and to stick this out. It just gets so hard though. Im tired of being the tough one that is completely fine with the situation. Im tired of being the mature one and the one with the answers to the problems. I have my own life and Id like to live it. For once, I would like to not care about you or what you have decided to do. You decided on sticking with it. Some may call it brave but I call it naive and selfish. Its not just about you, you have kids...one of which had to experience it in the worst way possible. "I dont want this to effect you Christina." Are you kidding me? I was 16. I knew what was going on before you did and I hate him. As much as you and I didnt get along I hated seeing you hurt. Sometimes...actually all the time I felt like it was my fault. Was I too much of a burden for you? Well Im sorry If Im not perfect, but who are you to judge what perfect is? Cuz God knows youre not. 
Sometimes... I wish I would take off this mask. The mask that hides everything as If I were  ashamed of what Im dealing with. Im not. Thats just the only way I know how to handle things. I keep them locked up until all my thoughts, my hurt, and my frustration dont fit anymore in my mind. Im tired of faking that Im ok. 
If you only knew what he put me through. I cried. I cried so much. I still cry. I didnt know one could grow up at the age of 7. It was scary, and lonely. Youll never understand what that was like, ever. If I could at least be told why I was treated that way. There must have been something I did. I was only a kid. It doesnt matter anymore. Nothing matters anymore. You wonder why I want to run? Who would want to stay in this hell hole you call a home? Im ready to live my life and deal with my own problems and be happy for once. I cant wait to be happy.
